name: Relay Chase
description:
Can you avoid the capo's forces and escape with the cargo in this short action-packed arcade? Control a variety of vehicles with your mouse and be ready to adapt quickly.

Completing the game on higher difficultie awards you with a more prestigious pen for the intro screen. Achieve the marble pen by staying above half health throughout all phases of the hard chase.

Created in 10 days for the 8 bits to infinity's 2nd mouse jam.
Extra credit:
     Sound effect contributions from Trudat Sound.
     Sound samples from freesound.org
